columns.Festival_ID: The unique identifier for each festival.
columns.Festival_Name: The name of the festival being celebrated.
columns.Chair_Name: The name of the chairperson overseeing the festival.
columns.Location: The location where the festival takes place.
columns.Year: The year in which the festival occurs.
columns.Num_of_Audience: The number of attendees at the festival.

festival_detail.table_description: The table details various festivals and their attributes.

columns.Artwork_ID: The unique identifier for each artwork.
columns.Type: The type or category of the artwork presented.
columns.Name: The title or name of the artwork.

artwork.table_description: The table catalogs various artworks and their details.

columns.Artwork_ID: The unique identifier for each nominated artwork.
columns.Festival_ID: The unique identifier for each festival associated with nominations.
columns.Result: The outcome of the nomination, indicating if it is won or nominated.

nomination.table_description: The table records nominations for artworks in various festivals.
